chapter.text: You open your eyes to a black void around you. ^1500Darkness as far as you can see. ^1500You look around and notice random things float around you. ^1500Glass shards, lockers, leaves, coins. ^1500You try to make sense of these things, before something catches your eye. ^6750^mediaâ€¨ through the debris, the red figure stands in the distance. ^1500He waves his hand, prompting you to follow.
